body:
I keep seeing PRs that convert a single package to `AutotoolsPackage`, and I thought to myself, why not do them all at once? 😆 

This PR mostly covers the simplest examples, like all of the Xorg/X11 stuff I packaged. I didn't really go out of my way to convert more complex packages to AutotoolsPackage. Yet.
title: Massive conversion from Package to AutotoolsPackage
